community_guidelines_intro: Welcome to the HEADLNE// community. To ensure a respectful and constructive environment for everyone, we ask that you follow these guidelines. Failure to comply may result in content removal or account suspension.
guideline_1_point_1: Treat others with respect, even if you disagree with their opinions.
guideline_1_point_2: Avoid personal attacks, harassment, derogatory language, or any form of hate speech.
guideline_1_point_3: Do not post content that is discriminatory, racist, sexist, homophobic, or otherwise offensive.
guideline_2_point_1: Ensure your comments are relevant to the headline or discussion thread.
guideline_2_point_2: Avoid spam, excessive self-promotion, or off-topic content.
guideline_3_point_1: Do not knowingly post misinformation, fake news, or misleading content.
guideline_3_point_2: If sharing information, try to verify its accuracy and cite your sources where possible.
guideline_4_point_1: Do not post explicit, violent, graphic, or sexually suggestive content.
guideline_4_point_2: Avoid content that promotes illegal or harmful activities.
guideline_5_point_1: Do not share personal information about yourself or others (addresses, phone numbers, etc.).
guideline_5_point_2: Respect the privacy of others and do not post content that could compromise it.
guideline_6_point_1: Do not impersonate another person, entity, or HEADLNE//.
guideline_6_point_2: Do not create fake accounts to deceive or manipulate others.
guideline_7_point_1: HEADLNE// moderators have the final say on the interpretation and enforcement of these guidelines.
guideline_7_point_2: If you have concerns, report them via the in-app tools rather than directly confronting other users.
community_guidelines_conclusion: By participating in HEADLNE//, you agree to these guidelines. Together, we can build an informed and respectful community.
no_description_available: No description available for this headline.

login_to_view_blocked_users: Log in to view blocked users.
delete_account_confirmation_text: This action is irreversible. All your data, including comments, reactions, and saved headlines, will be permanently deleted. To confirm, please type 'DELETE MY ACCOUNT' below.

account_deleted_success: Account deleted successfully. You will be redirected.
2fa_backup_info: Supabase MFA does not support traditional recovery codes. For backup, you can enroll multiple Time-based One-Time Password (TOTP) factors.
2fa_backup_multiple_devices_and_download: This allows you to use a different device or application as a backup if your primary TOTP device is unavailable. You can also download the QR code to store securely.
scan_qr_code_instructions: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app (e.g., Google Authenticator, Authy) then enter the 6-digit code to verify.
failed_to_get_qr_code: Failed to get QR code for 2FA.
scan_qr_code_to_enable_2fa: Scan QR code and verify to enable 2FA.
failed_to_verify_2fa: Failed to verify 2FA. Ensure code is correct and time is synced.
2fa_unverified_factor_exists_prompt_reen: It looks like you have an unverified 2FA factor. Please disable it or re-enroll to complete setup.
custom_tag_description: Add a custom tag to this feed for better organization and filtering.
cookie_consent_description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, serve personalized ads or content, and analyze our traffic. By clicking 'Accept All', you consent to our use of cookies.
necessary_cookies_description: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms.
analytics_cookies_description: These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.

upgrade_page_subtitle: Unlock powerful features and support the development of HEADLNE//.
pro_plan_description: For power users and news enthusiasts.

about_what_is_headlne_p1: HEADLNE// is a sleek news aggregator designed to give you the world at a glance. No endless scroll. No clickbait overload. Just the top headlines from trusted global sources, grouped by category and topic.
about_what_is_headlne_p2: We built HEADLNE// because the news shouldn't feel overwhelming. You decide what you see, how you see it, and when you read it.
about_feature_1_desc: see only the headlines you want.
about_feature_2_desc: browse news by country, category, or world events.
about_feature_3_desc: react, comment, and discuss stories with the community.
about_feature_4_desc: build your own personal reading list.
about_feature_5_desc: toggle images, full article links, and more.
about_why_headlne_p1: Whether you want a quick glance at global events or a place to discuss the headlines that matter, HEADLNE// keeps you in control.
about_why_headlne_p2: Read. React. Respond. Stay informed. Stay in control.

keyword_match_type_tooltip_fuzzy_desc: Fuzzy Match: Finds the keyword anywhere within a word (e.g., 'tech' matches 'TechCrunch').
keyword_match_type_tooltip_exact_desc: Exact Match: Only finds the keyword as a whole word (e.g., 'apple' matches 'Apple Inc.' but not 'pineapple').

modal_navigation_tutorial_swipe: On mobile, swipe left or right.
login_to_use_ai_summary: Please log in to use the AI summary feature.
upgrade_to_pro_for_ai_summary: Upgrade to Pro to use AI summaries.
features_page_subtitle: Discover everything HEADLNE// has to offer.
features_intro_p1: HEADLNE// is packed with powerful features designed to give you complete control over your news consumption. From personalised feeds to robust social interactions, explore how HEADLNE// can transform your daily news experience.
feature_clean_feed_desc: Focus on the headlines that matter with a minimalist interface, free from clutter and endless scrolling.
feature_global_coverage_desc: Browse news by country, category, tags, and sources to get a truly global perspective.
feature_political_leaning_desc: Cut through bias and broaden your perspective by filtering headlines based on their political leaning (Pro feature).
feature_powerful_search_desc: Find exactly what you're looking for with cross-source keyword search and advanced sorting options (views, comments, etc.).
feature_social_interactions_desc: React, comment, and discuss headlines with a vibrant community of informed users. Comments can be reported for moderation to ensure a respectful environment.
feature_save_for_later_desc: Build your personal reading list by saving headlines to revisit at your convenience.
feature_customisable_view_desc: Toggle images, full article links, and choose between light and dark themes for a tailored reading experience.
feature_custom_rss_desc: Add your own RSS feeds, including podcasts, to integrate all your favourite content into one place (Essential/Pro feature).
feature_video_feeds_desc: Follow your favourite video creators by adding their channels from YouTube, Vimeo, and Dailymotion (Pro feature).
feature_opml_import_desc: Easily import all your existing feeds from other services using an OPML file (Pro feature).
feature_keyword_alerts_desc: Receive instant alerts for headlines containing specific keywords you're monitoring (Essential/Pro feature).
feature_email_digests_desc: Get daily, weekly, or even hourly summaries of top stories based on your preferences, delivered straight to your inbox (Essential/Pro feature).
feature_admin_dashboard_desc: Access comprehensive analytics, user management, and content moderation tools (Admin only).
feature_moderation_dashboard_desc: Review and manage reported comments to maintain a healthy and respectful community (Admin only).
features_cta_title: Ready to experience news on your terms?
features_cta_subtitle: Sign up for free and start building your personalised news feed today.
feature_date_range_filter_desc: Filter headlines by a specific date range to find historical news or focus on recent events (Pro feature).
feature_sort_by_engagement_desc: Sort headlines by views, comments, reactions, saves, and shares to see what's truly resonating (Essential/Pro feature).
feature_ai_summary_desc: Get quick, concise AI-generated summaries of articles to grasp key points at a glance.
feature_email_digests_desc_updated: Receive summaries of top stories based on your preferences directly in your inbox. Weekly digests are free, daily digests are an Essential feature, and hourly digests are a Pro feature.
ai_summary_available_for_pro: An AI-generated summary is available for this article. Upgrade to Pro to view it instantly.
